Description:
20 Acre Hide Away
Offered 'For Sale' for the first time in over 40 years, this slice of paradise of 20 acres offers the whole family somewhere to fulfil their hobbies, whether it be gardening, equine pursuits, or simply enjoying peace and quiet. The home itself offers zoned living, including formal lounge and dining, plus informal living adjoining the updated kitchen, 4 bedrooms and two bathrooms. Outside caters for all leisurely interests and offers a myriad of shedding including, machinery shed, hayshed, double garage under roof line, plus stables which includes tack room, workshop area and additional machinery shed at the front for storing floats, trailers or quad bikes undercover. Year round water supply is assured for stock with a large spring fed dam, which pumps up to the large gravity fed water tank for water troughs and garden use. Further features include a round yard, cattle ramp, town water, open fire place to the formal living area and coonara to the living area plus air conditioning. All accessed via a sealed road and conveniently close to the Princes Highway and Monash Freeway – here is your chance to own your piece of paradise. Call today!
To view property video, please click the following link https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=znKV-SRuqrg&feature=youtu.be
Insights: 33 Officer Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Modern Brilliance
Not very often do you get the chance to buy an as new ultra-modern home of this calibre in the exclusive Grandevue Estate Officer.
With an open formal entry and hallway, the convenience of front study, master bedroom with ensuite with twin vanity and double shower plus a large
walk in robe. Theatre room is thoughtfully positioned towards the front of the home . Spacious central kitchen with white stone benchtops, 900s/s freestanding Blanco stove and yes walk in pantry plus soft closing doors/draws,
opening onto the separate meals and large tiled family room with feature gas log fire giving it a warm homely feel. The decked outdoor area has outstanding views and plenty of open space for all your entertaining needs.
The 2nd and 3rd bedrooms are generous in size with 4th bedroom option or kids rumpus room which can all be closed off from the main house and serviced by the modern bathroom and separate toilet. Double remote garage with internal entrance, modern laundry with plenty of storage. Low maintenance garden includes ducted heating, cooling and alarm. A great example of that modern fresh touch and ready for you. Why wait to build when this gem is ready to go.
Trevor Rowley : 0417 506 405

Description:
Potters Grove Officer- A Rare Offering
Be quick to secure this very special home in highly sought after Potters Grove Estate, surrounded by quality homes and opposite to the central park, this home screams family. This three year young, 4 bedroom home is packed with quality and appeal, it will capture your interest from the moment you step inside. As you enter you will find a grand master complete with sizeable walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity and oversized shower. Your living needs are well and truly catered for with lounge/theatre room, separate rumpus area and the eye-catching open plan kitchen, dining and living zones. The kitchen itself is an entertainers dream of style and sophistication with 40mm stone benchtops, pot drawers and stylish overhead cupboards, complemented by a lavish pantry. Quality appliances complete the package with 900mm free-standing stainless steel stove and dishwasher. The 3 remaining bedrooms are good size and have built-in robes and are all serviced by the elegant family bathroom. Other distinguished features include quality floating floor, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, ducted vacuum, 2600mm ceilings, quality fixtures and fittings throughout, wide garage for ample storage and internal access fully decked alfresco area with fan and café blinds and so much more. Located only a few minutes’ drive from all major amenities, primary and secondary schools, Officer train station, shopping complex and sporting facilities, inspection is a must.

Description:
Sophisticated living pleasure – Officer
Distinguished by its appearance and located in the popular Officer estate, this instantly inviting three bedroom plus study two bathroom home is defined by modern appearance and brilliant floorplan. Master features walk in robe & ensuite. The home enjoys sensational natural lighting with living spaces positioned at the rear which benefit from the northerly aspect with views overlooking the estate. This affordable home reveals an easy-care way of living. The Arena shops, childcare centre and schools are all within easy walking distance. A large modern kitchen which presents well with pantry, 90cm cooktop and rangehood, Westinghouse appliances including dishwasher make entertaining a breeze. The kitchen/meals/living room combine and open out to the wonderful outdoor living space complete with merbu decking, perfect for the summer BBQ's. Security is assured with security doors fitted throughout. The property has a greywater waste system and a solar hot water system which will save you money on utilities! Additional features include: LED lighting, GDH, split system cooling, separate laundry, ducted Vac, double blinds, oversized double garage with internal access, and more!
Don't delay; mark this on your calendar to view today!

Description:
Lifestyle Family Living on ¼ Acre!
With massive growth plans, Officer offers endless opportunities and is definitely the place to build your future. Whether you're an investor, developer, tradesman, large family or wise individual wanting to sit on a nest egg - here is your opportunity to secure a very valuable parcel of land and one of a kind home. This home has so much to offer and will give you that special feeling the moment you enter. This two storey home on approx. quarter of an acre features enormous living space. Comprising of 4 bedrooms in total, master with a generous ensuite and walk in wardrobe, three separate living areas, separate dining, ducted heating, split system cooling and ducted vacuum provides comfort all year round.
The beautiful timber kitchen offers granite benchtops and an ample amount of bench space with a separate island, dishwasher, gas cooktops and plenty of cupboard space. Outside you will discover a large undercover entertaining area overlooking your native garden and veggie patch. The home also features gated entry with side access, two bay carport with rear access to an enclosed garage and rear shedding.
Nestled amongst all the proposed parkland and within walking distance to both Officer Primary School and Berwick Grammar School, shops, new shopping precincts and public transport, this home is all you could ask for. With motivated vendors we have clear instructions to SELL, this is an opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
Beat the Rush!!
This immaculate townhouse will be sure to impress from its appealing façade, corner block location and proximity to the best officer has to offer.
Enticing three large bedrooms with master entailing walk in robe and ensuite, other bedrooms provide ample amount of floor space and built in robes. A well thought out floorplan with a living zone both downstairs and upstairs. Open plan kitchen with large island bench will be sure to impress the chef of the family then you have stacker doors that open out to your private entertaining area and backyard.
Double remote access garage with internal access provides a usable space to store your cars. Low maintenance gardens to the front and back enable you to enjoy the outdoor space and not have to worry about the gardens all weekend.
Located in the Arena estate, you have the added luxury or being able walk to the Arena shops and all the specialty stores that it has to offer. Within close proximity to the newly finished Cardinia Park train station and M1 freeway.
Be quick to call and inspect as this will not last long!

Description:
WOW!! Half an acre zoned UGZ3.
Set approximately 350m north of the Princes Highway, Officer, in the heart of one of the fastest growing suburbs in Australia, sits this modest family home on approximately half an acre of relatively flat land, zoned UGZ3. This is an outstanding investment opportunity with ample development opportunity STCA, whilst providing a comfortable place to live or rent out until ready to go.
Across the road from the local primary school, De Angelo's Winery and a new high density sub-division, the block dimensions for this property are approximately 20m x 100m. Only minutes to the train station, freeway, Beaconsfield and Berwick Village, with all its fantastic restaurants, cafÃ©s and schools, these offerings rarely come along and are only going to increase in price as demand for housing continues to grow.
The home comprises 3 bedrooms and one bathroom, polished timber floors in the lounge and a tiled kitchen and meals area, ducted heating and more. Surrounded by established gardens and hidden behind a high front fence, you are assured privacy as suburbia continues to grow around you.
If you have been looking for something to invest in, with the opportunity to develop, then look no further than this little gem. Offers are invited!
Insights: 38 Bayview Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2017 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Arena Estate Delight!
You know the words Location, Location, Location!
Look no further as this immaculate family sized home is located close to all amenities such as the Cardinia Road train station, M1 access, Arena Shopping Hub, schools and child care facilities!
This large and spacious home offers four great sized bedrooms all with built in robes are serviced by the main bathroom and luxurious master suite with plantation shutters, walk in robe and ensuite.
Two generous sized living spaces allow for every member of the family to have their own area to enjoy.
The kitchen is the heart of the home with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher! Quality pot drawers, glass splashbacks and walk in pantry complete the ultimate kitchen setup!
Ducted heating and split system cooling keep you in perfect comfort at any time of the year!
Enjoy entertaining? The property has a brilliant alfresco entertaining area ready for all the summer bbq’s!
Added features of the home are a double garage with rear access, quality window furnishings and carpets all situated on a 484sqm in the exclusive Arena estate!
Call today to arrange a time to inspect!

Here for the taking
From the moment you enter you will be struck by the feeling of space and proportion provided by the high ceilings and free flowing floor plan. The open plan lounge and dining area takes you effortlessly out to the large covered alfresco area for relaxing and entertaining, also featuring;
- 3 great size bedrooms
- Master with full ensuite and double robes
- Galley style kitchen with stone benchtops
- Oversize remote lockup garage
This home is central to schools, shops, transport and offers easy freeway access - don't miss another fantastic opportunity.

Description:
Instantly Inviting, Perfectly Presented - Officer
Immaculately presented and timelessly appealing, this delightful modern home is set and awaits its next owner.
Comfortably appointed accommodation comprises entrance, well equipped kitchen to living/dining with and URL alfresco that is further extended by an additional pergola making indoor outdoor living easy! Featuring three excellent bedrooms, master features ensuite, walk in robe, and other two bedrooms are close to the master bathroom. A delightfully warm and welcoming design further enhances the allure of this family friendly and practically designed home.
The kitchen features large 90cm cooker, canopy rangehood, stone benches and is complemented with designer lighting. Creature comforts include: double blinds, drapes, gas ducted heating, split system cooling, new flooring, and single remote garage with internal access. Outdoors the block is nicely landscaped in an easy care manner, located close to the freeway and walkable to Cardinia Train station.
Get excited and get to the open home, delays in today's market are at your peril!

Description:
Walk to the Train & Town Centre from this Modern Entertainer!
Located in the popular Potters Grove Estate with some of the best schools in the South Eastern Suburbs close by and only 900m to the train station and the developing Officer Town Centre, this property represents great value and family living at its best. Officer is a fast growing township and with easy freeway access to the City, Berwick, Beaconsfield and the Fountain Gate Shopping Centre. The fabulous 4 bedroom home with 2 living areas, offers zoned living with 3 of the 4 bedrooms at the rear of the home, all with built in robes and the spacious Master with walk in robe and stylish ensuite at the front. In the middle you'll find the open plan dining and living areas combined with the sleek chef's kitchen in contemporary colours, quality stainless appliances and plenty of storage. Add to this a second living/rumpus room and both living areas have access to the undercover outdoor entertaining area and great sized rear yard with lawn, perfect for the kids to run around in safety. Features of the home include gas ducted heating and split system cooling for the ultimate in comfort all year round, quality soft furnishings and on trend colour scheme complete the picture. All that's left is space for vehicles which is covered with a double remote controlled garage with internal access to the home. This lovely home is ready to move straight into and enjoy, be quick to book your private inspection and join the growing community at Potters Grove.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
Nest or Invest For Christmas!
Opportunity awaits the lucky buyer of this immaculately kept four bedroom home in the sought after Arcadia Estate! Set close to all amenities such as schools, shops, Club Officer, medical facilities and only walking distance to Cardinia Road train station, this home has all you could ask for.
Upon entry you are welcomed with a spacious master bedroom, ensuite with walk in robe with the three remaining great sized bedrooms featuring built-in-robes and their own private hallway connecting to the main bathroom and separate toilet. Moving throughout the home, there is a separate living area with a large open plan family meals area perfect for entertaining all year round.
The modern kitchen features stainless steel appliances, gas cooktops with 900mm oven and dishwasher. Outside you have a great sized double garage and 2 separate outdoor entertaining areas, ideal for a kids zone.
The home also has some great features included such as ducted heating, split system air-conditioner, security system with internal sensors, quality roller blinds throughout with a low maintenance gardens with no work to be done!
This home has it all and won’t last long, contact us today!

Description:
Views, Park, Schools & Shops
Alex Scott and Staff are proud to present 69 Grandvue Boulevard, Officer. A well-presented family home in a family friendly Estate.
Key features include:
- Four bedrooms - master complete with generous ensuite and walk through robe.
- Study or fifth bedroom.
- Spacious kitchen with 900mm oven, stone benchtops and massive walk in pantry.
- Light filled family/meals area, kids retreat and front formal lounge. Three living rooms in total.
- Fully landscaped front and rear back yard.
Additional features include oversized double garage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 9ft ceilings, six star energy rating, timber flooring and under roofline alfresco. All conveniently located on a massive 600m2 approx lot, in the desirable and highly sought after Grandvue Estate. The park is directly opposite and in close proximity to Arena Shopping Village, St Francis Secondary College, freeway access and surrounded by prestigious homes. Why build when this little beauty is under two years old. What you see is what your get. Make this home your New Year's resolution. Call Matt Koster today to secure your private inspection.

Description:
LAKE FRONTAGE – BRILLIANT PRESENTATION
This executive style town home is an absolute standout in this price range. From the modern kitchen featuring stone counter tops and stainless appliances to the upstairs light filled bedrooms, to the highly sought after location. You also get a lock up garage and private courtyard. Quick easy access to the freeway and Club Officer, if you prefer the train, a short 5 minute walk and you are at the Cardinia Road station. Take in the views of the beautiful park and wetlands all from your own balcony. Built buy JG King, this town home will suit a broad range of buyers.

Description:
6676sqm of Prime Development Potential
Zoned residential, located in Officer’s prime residential district, this amazing opportunity on approximately 6676m2.
Take advantage of this land being directly next to proposed and current schools, proposed Community Centre and right next to the proposed neighborhood Activity Centre
Officer has so much to offer with regular Trains to the City, local shops, doctors, schools and great café’s making this one of the most sought after suburbs in the south east region.
Existing home comprising of 3 bedrooms with great shedding would make a perfect rental property whilst waiting for plans and permits (STCA)
If you have been searching for that special property that can setup your future or if you are and astute developer or investor then this property is one not to be missed. Call or email for more information as I would love to assist in this exceptional and rare opportunity.
